meanings.sent1: She made a small wager with her friend on who would finish their homework first.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends placed wagers on which team would win the basketball game.
meanings.sent3: The friendly wager between siblings added excitement to their study session.
meanings.sent4: His love for wagers made him a regular at the local casino.
meanings.sent5: The high-stakes wager kept everyone on the edge of their seats.

meanings.definition: To bet on the outcome of an event.
meanings.sent1: He wagers on horse races every weekend for fun.
meanings.sent2: She wagers on the lottery numbers hoping to win big.
meanings.sent3: The cat wagers on catching the elusive red dot every evening.
meanings.sent4: The detective wagers on solving the case before anyone else.
meanings.sent5: The farmer wagers on a good harvest this year with the new fertilizer.

meanings.definition: To risk or stake something on the outcome of a contest or event.
meanings.sent1: She wagers her savings on the success of her new business venture.
meanings.sent2: He wagers his reputation on the accuracy of his predictions.
meanings.sent3: The chef wagers his pride on creating the best dish in the competition.
meanings.sent4: The explorer wagers his life on reaching the summit of the mountain.
meanings.sent5: The student wagers her free time on joining the school play.
